# juju_model (Data Source)

A data source representing a Juju Model.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "juju_model" "this" {
  name = "development"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name to be assigned to the model.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
